posts.text:
Keypt ný 2007
Mjög vel með farin.
Harður diskur endurnýjaður, setti í hana 160 GB Intel SSD disk.
Windows 10 Home löglegt.
Rafhlaða endist rúman klukkutíma.
Fartölvu "veski" fylgir.
Dell Inspiron 1520 Specs:
⦁ Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo T7300 (1.8 GHz/4MB L2 Cache) 
⦁ OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Home 
⦁ Hard Drive: 160 GB Intel SSD 
⦁ Screen: 15.4″ WSXGA Widescreen (1440 x 900) 
⦁ Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT 256MB 
⦁ RAM: 4.0GB DDR2 SDRAM @667 MHz (2 x 2GB) 
⦁ Optical Drive: 8x CD/DVD burner (DVD+/-RW) w/Double Layer Support 
⦁ Battery: 9-cell lithium ion 
⦁ Wireless: Intel 4965AGN 
⦁ Weight: 6.4 lbs 
⦁ Dimensions: 1.47-1.65? (H) x 14.12 ? (W) x 10.59″ (D) 
⦁ Ports/Slots: 1 IEEE 1394 (FireWire); 4 Universal Serial Bus (USB 2.0); 8-in-1 Memory Card Reader; VGA Out; S-Video; RJ-45 Ethernet LAN; RJ-11 Modem; ExpressCard 54mm; stereo in, headphone/speaker out and dual digital mics
Verð 10.000 kr
Hvað segiru um 7000 kr fyrir hana?
Látum þetta malla fram yfir mánaðarmót, færð hana þá á 7 ef enginn vill hana á 10
